text: Nabiyow ama koros Astootik Asta keenih baahe waytek atu isih tet ginteh macah tet baahe waytaa? kok iyyan, Nabiyow keenik ixxic: woh yol tanim hinna cagalah anu kataatam Yi Rabbik wacyih yol obsimtaama, ama Qhuraanay siinil akriye sin Rabbik Baxxaqqa iyya sumaaqay anu numm√¢ farmoyta kinniyoomuh Asta yoh yakke kinni, usuk yeemene marah tirtoo kee Racmata
